definitions.definition: To strike (a person), originally with something flat or heavy, but now specifically in such a way as to discolour the skin without breaking it; to contuse.
To damage the skin of (fruit or vegetables), in an analogous way.
Of fruit or vegetables, to gain bruises through being handled roughly .
To fight with the fists ; to box .
To harm or injure somebody's feelings or self-esteem.
examples: Her thoughtless remarks bruised my ego.
I was bruise d by such wanton criticism.

definitions.definition: To impair (gin) by shaking rather than stirring.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To strike (a person), originally with something flat or heavy, but now specifically in such a way as to discolour the skin without breaking it; to contuse.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To damage the skin of (fruit or vegetables), in an analogous way.
( intransitive ) Of fruit or vegetables, to gain bruises through being handled roughly .
( intransitive ) To fight with the fists ; to box .
( transitive , figurative ) To harm or injure somebody's feelings or self-esteem.
( transitive ) To impair (gin) by shaking rather than stirring.
